name: Roasted Spaghetti Squash
author: clare
summary: Roasted spaghetti squash instead of spaghetti noodles! Top with the favorite sauce of your choice.
ingredients: 1 (2 pound) spaghetti squash, halved and seeded
2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Brush both sides of the squash with olive oil, sprinkle with salt, and place cut-side up in a baking pan
Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Uncover and continue to roast until tender, about 35 minutes more
Use a fork to scrape the squash flesh into a large bowl and toss with Parmesan cheese
